dct_title_s: Offshore Block Groups in the Gulf of Mexico, Fall 2012
dct_description_sm: This polygon dataset contains information that defines the block groups for the Gulf of Mexico Outer Continental Shelf Region. This layer includes data for fall quarter 2012.

This layer is intended to assist users in locating and analyzing information on the Gulf of Mexico's offshore block groups and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.
This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
dct_rights_sm: These data are licensed by Stanford Libraries and are available to Stanford University affiliates only. Affiliates are limited to current faculty, staff and students. Non affiliates seeking access should contact the publisher directly. These data may not be reproduced or used for any purpose without permission.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Copyright ownership resides with the originator.
